source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.
source_objects.title: Leadership

items.title: Become a Leader in Sustainable Development

visible_instructors.name: Annie
visible_instructors.title: Annie Goeke
visible_instructors.job_title: Leader in sustainable community building for over 30 years

items.headline: Learn how to use powerful tools and processes that prepare you to be an Innovative Change Maker.
objectives_summary: Identify their own blockages to accessing creative states
Understand the meaning and significance of “sustainable development”
Understand our Holistic Action Planning for Innovation methodology as a sustainable development tool

items.title: Lean Six Sigma - White Belt Course
items.headline: Online White Belt Course. Learn what Lean Six Sigma is, why it is used, and how it can be applied to your industry.
objectives_summary: To acquire a basic understanding of Six Sigma and Lean
To obtain knowledge about the DMAIC process (Six Sigma structure) and their roles
To understand specific DMAIC processes including how to define, measure, analyze, improve, and control

items.title: Conflict Management Using Key NLP Skills

visible_instructors.name: Beyond Training
visible_instructors.title: Beyond Training Solutions
visible_instructors.job_title: NLP Trainers, Communication and Confidence Experts

items.headline: Learn how to have the inner resources and skills to manage conflict and feel calm and empowered in difficult situations
objectives_summary: handle conflict
avoid conflict
be aware of conflict triggers

items.title: Become a trainer

visible_instructors.job_title: International NLP, Coaching, Hypnosis, Body language trainer
visible_instructors.name: Wayne
visible_instructors.title: Wayne Farrell

items.headline: Trainers training
objectives_summary: How to effectively deliver training to meet all your students learning styles
Enhance your ability and skill level as a trainer
You will be equipped with skills and resources to assist you in delivering quality training in your field of expertise

items.title: Leadership Presence 30 Day Challenge

visible_instructors.job_title: Leadership & Soft Skills for Emerging Leaders
visible_instructors.name: Kara
visible_instructors.title: Kara Ronin

items.headline: Introduction to building a leadership reputation. Start improving communication skills. Learn powerful body language.
objectives_summary: Introduction into building your leadership presence and reputation.
Ideas to create a leadership outfit.
Body language gestures to convey more authority.

items.title: Leadership, Communication & Citizenship - SPARK
items.headline: A 2 Hours Journey to Leadership, Communication & Citizenship
objectives_summary: They will learn and adapt leadership skills that are required in their daily life.
They will be developing effective communication skills.
The participants will be encouraged to share their perspective and opinions through neutral platforms and encourage the exchange of views by being tolerant and open towards opposing ideas

items.title: Leadership Assessment & Development
items.headline: Delivering on 7 levels of leadership
objectives_summary: Use your own assessment results to determine the best path to your personal leadership development
Understand Your Strengths, Weaknesses and Blindspots on 7 Levels of Leadership
Create a workplace culture of profitability, innovation, stakeholder loyalty, team coherence and personal satisfaction

items.title: Therapy at Work
items.headline: A Crash Course in Therapy for Leaders
objectives_summary: You will learn what makes a therapist effective and how that applies to their career.
You will discover the foundations of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, including the ABC Technique and the Thought Review Process, and common errors in thinking

You will learn how to guide team members whose productivity is affected by being overwhelmed, anxious, bored, stressed, lonely, discouraged, burned out, or from facing difficult personal circumstances and/or conflict

items.title: Developing Leadership Skills
items.headline: Leadership Personality, Motivation & Creativity
objectives_summary: Getting insight into your leadership personality and style
Understanding your roles in team situations
Being aware of conflict management styles

items.title: Advanced Psychology for Stress and Leadership
items.headline: Thriving in a way that is healthy, authentic, sustainable, and research-based
objectives_summary: Psychology of the stress response
Psychology of leadership
The art of recovery

items.title: Agile Leadership
items.headline: Four Values to Help You Lead in an Environment of Change
objectives_summary: How to assess your current level of leadership agility
How to assess your current leadership style
How to become an Agile Leader

items.title: Leadership & Organizational Development

visible_instructors.title: Tom Eddington
visible_instructors.job_title: Consultant, educator, entrepreneur, and strategic advisor
visible_instructors.name: Tom

items.headline: Part of the Conscious Leadership Mastery Series [C7]
objectives_summary: Specific OD techniques as they apply to a Conscious Leader
The importance of a purpose driven culture
How to lower staff turnover, increase engagement and improve knowledge retention

items.title: Warrior Leadership

visible_instructors.job_title: Author & Facilitator specialising in Leadership & Embodiment
visible_instructors.name: Francis
visible_instructors.title: Francis Briers

items.headline: Drawing on ancient warrior wisdom to embody powerful presence and graceful leadership in challenging times
objectives_summary: Understand the practical difference between leadership and management and how to be a leader whatever role we hold
Influence with integrity
Explore how ancient Warrior philosophy can bring meaning to modern life

items.title: Achieve Your Goals: OLYMPIAN Goal Setting Strategies
items.headline: Become Unstoppable - ACHIEVE your Goals Faster - Boost Productivity - Master the Skills of Success - Feel Great!
objectives_summary: Discover the goal setting strategies that will help you achieve your goals faster and more easily.
How to develop the focus, confidence and courage to achieve your goals.
How to navigate challenges and setbacks with agility and become more productive.

items.title: Leadership 2.0 - The Coaching Way (Become a Workplace Coach)

visible_instructors.job_title: Co-Founder of Happ Coach, Certified Coach, Corporate Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Gitanjali
visible_instructors.title: Gitanjali Bagchi

items.headline: To power through every challenge, what kind of a leadership style would you rather have - a coach or a cowboy?
objectives_summary: Become inspiring and effective leaders in the workplace by adopting a coaching style of leadership

items.title: Becoming an Empathic Leader
items.headline: Enhance your empathy and listening skills to nurture better relationships
objectives_summary: Understand the common relationships dynamics that are unhealthy
Learn about the listening and responding barriers that compromise our relationships
Discover practical guideline to become an active listener
